channel.title: Colored Whip INTS (Old Whips) - Delta

item.title: Colored Whip INTS (Old Whips) - Delta
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Please use code tags.

Also, if anyone wants this for PI:

if(i == 8001)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
itemDef.name = "Rune whip";
itemDef.description = "A weapon from the abyss. ".getBytes();
itemDef.anIntArray156 = new int[1];

itemDef.anIntArray160[0] = 36133;

itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;

item.title: Colored Whip INTS (Old Whips) - Delta
item.dc:creator: @jackfrost890 jackfrost890
item.description:
@jackfrost890 wrote:

Hello basically all I did was change the color of the whips for all those who need the Old whip Int Changed.
What you need to do is simply go to the Client folder and open Class8.java then just copy and paste (:

if(i == 8001) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aString170 = "Rune whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon from the abyss. ".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; class8.anInt174 = 5412;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 5409;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; } if(i == 8005) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aString170 = "Bronze whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon from the abyss. ".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 127; class8.anInt174 = 5412;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 5409;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

To add them server sided open up item.cfg
then simply copy and paste this to the bottom

item = 8001 Rune_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8002 Dragon_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8003 Gold_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8004 White_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8009 Steel_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8008 Adamant_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8007 Iron_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8006 Mithril_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8005 Bronze_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8010 Cyan_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 item = 8011 Barrows_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 200000 200000 200000 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0

I did this was because a lot of people are trying to make colored whips with the old model. If you donâ€™t have the old model then it will not work to download the old model find it in moparscape they should have it.

This will only add colored whips not the specials so you have to do the specials yourself.

Change the item id number to fit your server

Have fun (:

Read full topic
